name: Mailman (itch)
description:
-Early ideas pretty much complete version-

Navigate your car through the neighborhood on your daily route but beware the dogs who are ready to get your truck with ONE BIG CHOMP.

Deliver the mail!

Avoid the giant dogs!

CONTROLS
Accelerate: W
Decelerate: S
Deliver Mail: D
Turning: Arrow Keys
Toggle Fullscreen: F (Windows Version Only)

Your truck will always drive on the right side of the road. You can only deliver mail if you on the same side of the road as the house.

Be careful! It can be difficult to deliver if you're going to fast!

This was made on a quick arcade idea I thought of. It has most of the core ideas and gameplay but lacks things like balance or an actual scoring system.

Press P for a rough test of the package delivery portion I didn't feel comfortable actually integrating!

Run the door (with the arrow keys) and back to the truck without getting caught.
